author: trawick
msg: apr_socket_sendfile() on Solaris: Fix handling of files truncated
after the sender determines the length.  (This fixes a busy loop in
httpd when a file being served is truncated.)
Some other implementations of apr_socket_sendfile() were already
patched along the way to handle this; some apparently remain broken.

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-171 Refactoring the comming test code out into a shared module called UDDI-TCK. Both the juddi-core and uddi-client tests can use this code now.

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-195. python: Add a simple THttpServer
